Notes.Text:
This update for libcryptopp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-28285: Fixed potential leak of secret key of ElGamal encryption via fault injection (bsc#1224280)

Vulnerabilities.Description: A Fault Injection vulnerability in the SymmetricDecrypt function in cryptopp/elgamal.h of Cryptopp Crypto++ 8.9, allows an attacker to co-reside in the same system with a victim process to disclose information and escalate privileges.
